The answer is B: A grand castle at night with fireworks and a crowd dancing on the steps. This description matches the setting of the movie Descendants, where the main character, Mal, discovers her true identity as the daughter of King Beast and must navigate the challenges of being part of royal lineage while also standing up for what she believes in. The setting of the movie includes grand castles, fireworks, and scenes of celebration and dancing.
